Title: Enacts the "fair concession pricing act"
Summary: Enacts the "fair concession pricing act" to require certain entertainment and sports venues constructed or operating under public financial benefit to implement fan-friendly concession pricing policies.
LawCode: Add ยง397-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring certain entertainment and sports venues constructed or operating under public financial benefit to implement fan-friendly concession pricing policies
